text: læa cng raluk thung khna thi rea di klaw wa phwk cea cng kheapi nı meuxng ni læw cng briphokh cak meuxng nan xyang kwangkhwang n thi thi phwk cea prarthna læa cng khea pratu nan pi nı sphaph phu nom srisʹa lng dwy khwam nxbnxm læa cng klaw wa “hitteaahˌ” rea k ca xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk cea sung brrda khwam phid khxng phwk cea læa rea ca pheimphun kæ brrda phu kratha khwam di
